overview: The ancient man conveys the emperor's will to the cherry blossom prince and asks him to go to the Seonocheonhoe, but he refuses because he can't. Man Su-san orders the head of the family to send her a letter to Si-woo, so he removes her bing-ok and finds the two women who are in a hurry and brings them to his house. On the way, the monk and his party run into the enemy's subordinates in front of the royal tomb, and eventually fight with their captain, Geum Si-woo. Meanwhile, Shi-Woo rushes out with his weapon, the Beopgi, and the monks hide in the valley again. While the classmates and the monks were exchanging hostages, the horseman suddenly dies, and the two fight again. In the end, in this fight, his leg was crushed by a large rock, and the monks who saw it released him and started to slow down again.
title: Glory of Legend
